easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I fly without wings and I cry without eyes. What am I?

medium.q: I am a number. If you add me to myself, I become 12. If you subtract me from myself, I become 0. What number am I?

hard.q: A box has four switches named North, South, East, and West. Each switch is either on or off. A secret rule says: exactly two switches are on, and they are opposite each other. How many different ways can you set the switches to satisfy the rule?
hard.hint: Opposite pairs: NS or EW; both on or off counts.
